name: Run Spot Run PRO
description:
A 2.5D game in which you help a dog named "Spot" run away from certain doom.

Tap the screen to help Spot get from plank to plank, and to collect points.
Double-tapping performs a double-jump.

Points are made by collecting bones and sausages.

However, it is not as easy as you think... Boxes of various types are randomly placed along the planks to make your jumps harder to time.

An extra life (and extra points) can be gained by collecting the B-O-N-E-U-S letters in order, up to a maximum of 5 lives.

This game does NOT require signing into an account of any kind.
It does not share any information.
High scores are on the device only. Upto three initials can be entered onto leaderboard of Top Dogs.

There are no In-App Purchases. The are NO ads in this PRO version.
